data.name: Giana Sisters: Twisted Dreams - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Experience a dual soundtrack by Chris Hülsbeck and Machinae Supremacy!



This is the official soundtrack for Giana Sisters: Twisted Dreams and Giana Sisters: Twisted Dreams - Rise of the Owlverlord, a re-imagined, re-invented reincarnation of the classic Giana Sisters.

Brand new game innovations include an awesome twist that let's the player switch between 2 personalities of Giana, cute and punk, which have different abilities and game-play mechanics. Not only Giana, but the whole world morphs from fairy tale to nightmare and back and so does the music: Chris Huelsbeck Productions & Fabian Del Priore created the compositions and Machinae Supremacy provided heavy metal renditions of the in-game tracks, that can also fade smoothly between cute and punk - you have to play the game to fully experience this effect. But here's the full soundtrack with all the tracks in both versions for you to enjoy if you're away from the game.

You will find mp3 and FLAC files in your Giana Sisters Twisted Dreams folder in the Steam Directory:
...Steam\steamapps\common\Giana Sisters Twisted Dreams\Soundtrack

Simply go to C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Giana Sisters Twisted Dreams\Soundtrack
Note, it may be in C:\Program Files\... or D:\Program Files\... depending on your Steam settings.

Giana Sisters Twisted Dreams
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. Chris Huelsbeck & Fabian Del Priore - GSTD OST - Main Theme 03:03
2. Chris Huelsbeck & Fabian Del Priore - GSTD OST - Ingame 1 02:05
3. Chris Huelsbeck & Fabian Del Priore - GSTD OST - Ingame 2 03:15
4. Chris Huelsbeck & Fabian Del Priore - GSTD OST - Ingame 3 02:20
5. Chris Huelsbeck & Fabian Del Priore - GSTD OST - Ingame 4 02:17
6. Chris Huelsbeck & Fabian Del Priore - GSTD OST - Ingame 5 03:28
7. Chris Huelsbeck & Fabian Del Priore - GSTD OST - Boss 1 02:14
8. Chris Huelsbeck & Fabian Del Priore - GSTD OST - Boss 2 01:45
9. Chris Huelsbeck & Fabian Del Priore - GSTD OST - Level Complete 00:09
10. Chris Huelsbeck & Fabian Del Priore - GSTD OST - Score Loop 01:00
11. Machinae Supremacy - GSTD OST - Ingame 1 (Machinae Supremacy Version) 02:06
12. Machinae Supremacy - GSTD OST - Ingame 2 (Machinae Supremacy Version) 03:06
13. Machinae Supremacy - GSTD OST - Ingame 3 (Machinae Supremacy Version) 02:21
14. Machinae Supremacy - GSTD OST - Ingame 4 (Machinae Supremacy Version) 02:16
15. Machinae Supremacy - GSTD OST - Ingame 5 (Machinae Supremacy Version) 03:28
16. Machinae Supremacy - GSTD OST - Boss 1 (Machinae Supremacy Version) 02:10
17. Machinae Supremacy - GSTD OST - Boss 2 (Machinae Supremacy Version) 01:41
18. Chris Huelsbeck & Fabian Del Priore - GSTD OST - Failed 00:08
19. Fabian Del Priore & Jan Zottmann - GSTD OST - Credits 04:45

Giana Sisters: Twisted Dreams - Rise of the Owlverlord
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. Rise of the Owlverlord (Chris Huelsbeck & Fabian Del Priore) 03:10
2. Warriors of the Four Winds (Chris Huelsbeck & Fabian Del Priore) 02:28
3. Pirates of the Seven Skies (Machinae Supremacy Version) 02:28
4. Clockwork Dynamo (Chris Huelsbeck & Fabian Del Priore) 02:18
5. Steam-Powered Piston (Machinae Supremacy Version) 02:18
6. The Assassin’s Scheme (Chris Huelsbeck & Fabian Del Priore) 02:54
7. The Buccaneer’s Gambit (Machinae Supremacy Version) 02:54

Total Length: 61:38
Dual Genre: Electronica / Chiptune metal
Produced by Chris Huelsbeck
Written by Chris Huelsbeck Productions, Fabian Del Priore & Machinae Supremacy
Credits Theme written by Fabian Del Priore & Jan Zottmann, Guitars by Eike "Romeo Knight" Steffen.
